content:
Set-AzureRmAppServicePlan

Sets an Azure App Service plan.

In this Article

Syntax

Set-AzureRmAppServicePlan [-ResourceGroupName] <String> [-Name] <String> [[-AdminSiteName] <String>]
 [[-Tier] <String>] [[-NumberofWorkers] <Int32>] [[-WorkerSize] <String>] [[-PerSiteScaling] <Boolean>]
 [<CommonParameters>]
Set-AzureRmAppServicePlan [-AppServicePlan] <ServerFarmWithRichSku> [<CommonParameters>]

Description

The Set-AzureRmAppServicePlan cmdlet sets an Azure App Service plan.

Examples

1:

PS C:\>Set-AzureRmAppServicePlan -ResourceGroupName "Default-Web-WestUS" -Name "ContosoAppServPlan" -PerSiteScaling  $true

This command sets the PerSiteScaling option to true on the App Service plan named ContosoAppServPlan that belongs to the resource group named Default-Web-WestUS.

Parameters

-AdminSiteName

Admin Site Name

Type:String
Required:False
Position:2
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-Tier

Tier

Type:String
Required:False
Position:3
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-NumberofWorkers

Number Of Workers

Type:Int32
Required:False
Position:4
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-WorkerSize

Worker Size

Type:String
Required:False
Position:5
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-PerSiteScaling

Per Site Scaling Boolean

Type:Boolean
Required:False
Position:6
Default value:False
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-ResourceGroupName

Resource Group Name

Type:String
Required:True
Position:0
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-Name

App Service Plan Name

Type:String
Required:True
Position:1
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:False
Accept wildcard characters:False
-AppServicePlan

App Service Plan Object

Type:ServerFarmWithRichSku
Required:True
Position:0
Default value:None
Accept pipeline input:True (ByValue)
Accept wildcard characters:False

Related Links

  • Get-AzureRmWebApp
  • New-AzureRmWebApp
  • Remove-AzureRmWebApp
  • Restart-AzureRmWebApp
  • Start-AzureRmWebApp
  • Stop-AzureRmWebApp
